title: Trace
description: Originally produced in 2006 with roots in Goa trance, 'Trace' resurfaces after years underground, refined into a deeper, more cinematic form of melodic techno. It's a track that bridges past and present, carrying the pulse of its origins into a more mature, immersive soundscape.

title: To The Top
description: With gentle synth layers, a beautiful melody, and an undercurrent of quiet determination, it captures the feeling of focused ascent, driven not by force, but by inner resolve.

title: Summer Rain
description: A gentle blend of ambient textures and slow beats, this track captures the feeling of wandering through an enchanted forest in the rain, where every drop reveals hidden light and color.
